outputs.output_descr: This project is designed to provide institutional assistance in the development of partnerships among European, Asian and Pacific countries in the preparation of plans to transit from traditional models of economy to 'green' growth concepts for the implementation of the Green Bridge Astana Initiative and in pursuance of the Ministerial Declaration adopted by the Ministerial Conference on Environment and Development in Asia and the Pacific (2010), as well as by the Pan-European Ministerial Conference 'Environment for Europe' (2011 ).

project_descr: Assistance to Kazakhstan in Improving Interregional Cooperation for the Green Growth Promotion and Astana Initiative Implementation
